abstract: More technology deals are on the way as the industry recovers from the recession, but Microsoft is not poised to make a big deal soon, its chief financial officer said Friday.
snippet: More technology deals are on the way as the industry recovers from the recession, but Microsoft is not poised to make a big deal soon, its chief financial officer said Friday.
lead_paragraph: More technology deals are on the way as the industry recovers from the recession, but Microsoft is not poised to make a big deal soon, its chief financial officer, Peter Klein, told Reuters on Friday.

headline.main: Microsoft’s C.F.O. Sees Upturn in Tech Mergers
